name: Airport Item Rescue
description:
**Game may take 30 or so seconds to load for the first time
Arrow keys to move
Shift to Sprint
E to pick up items, put them down or interact

Welcome to your new job as the "Lost & Found" airport clerk!
Passengers lose all sorts of items around the airports, be it phones, baby bottles or knives, and they need your help!
Lost items can end up all over the place, sometimes other passengers find them, sometimes they are thrown away, a few passengers even seem to accidentally drop them into the toilet...

Help as many of them as you can before your shift ends, earn tips and purchase items to help you with your job, good luck!

Chironyx - Art & Technical Art
Blank Mask - Programming
